events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit me properly and the color looks different than expected.
The customer's request for a refund due to dissatisfaction with the product color and fit has been classified under the Refund cluster.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I will help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase?
To process your refund further, could you please confirm whether the item is unused and still has its original tags intact?
Thank you for the quick response. The order number is 987654321 and I purchased it on May 15th. The jacket is unused and all the tags are still attached.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label which we will email to you shortly.
I appreciate your quick help and the prepaid label offer. Looking forward to completing the return and getting the refund soon.
We have received the jacket and processed your refund. You should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to ask if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and the case is resolved, we are now closing this support ticket. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We appreciate your feedback.
